resources.string: Google Shopper combines barcode scanning with online and local prices, reviews and more without opening the browser. Would you like to try it?
In order to continue, you must update Samsung Any Scan now. This should only take a few moments.
Sorry, the requested application could not be launched. The barcode contents may be invalid.
An error occurred while fetching data. Please try again later.
A network connection is required to complete this task. Please connect to a Wi-Fi or data network.
Are you sure you want to exit the application?
